title: Whats up with this? (RIOT please help)
body:
This still hasn't been addressed (or even acknowledged. which is worse)

This is not a moan about a champ being OP or me thinking there is a bug when really its just my stupidity.
this is a legitimate provable inconsistency with the game. (one that affects gameplay.)

I Know RIOT cant reply to everything, but this is an important matter, and a reply wold be appreciated.
i have posted about this issue before, and will do again until someone actually acknowledges that it exists.

As for the issue itself, the ability indicators on at least 2 champions are incorrect, Anivia and Illaoi

you can see in the images below that the spell effect for Illaoi's Q extends outside the Indicated area, and the Spell effect for Anivia's Q is much smaller than the indicator.

With Illaoi, Gangplank is clearly outside the indicator yet he is still struck. (and unless Gangplank's hitbox extends way out past his outermost feature (foot) i seriously doubt it is a hitbox problem (and if it is a hitbox issue, then there is still a clarity problem))
http://imgur.com/lTbjZoy

With Anivia, 4 minions are well and truly inside the indicator (and a 5th is half inside) yet only one is damaged and stunned.
http://imgur.com/ifjTD1A

As you can see, this is clearly an issue of 'Clarity'
now Worlord Shen's Flag had an animation error the patch he came out, it would sway correctly one to one side but then jerk over to the other side without animation, and that has been fixed now. So if there is someone that has the time to fix that (much appreciated btw it was very annoying) I'm sure that there is someone who can look into this as this is as issue that actually affects gameplay.

I'm pretty sure its the same with the nautilus q. They should have a look in to that as well

There is nothing wrong with Illaoi's Q at all. The thing is the hitbox of the champions, it extends out a little from what you see which is why i ALWAYS get hit by lux snare even when it goes right the F**K past me!

Steel legion lux ult is completely fucked.
If the line is right over the middle of a champ it misses but if it's a bit to the side it hits...
anivia's q is the indicator bugging and traveling faster than the actual spell

Hey man,

Thanks for the report! I have raised this to the team and we will try fix it asap. In future I think the best place to report issues like this is under Report a bug sub board.
